description: "SharePoint Document Sets are still half Classic".Not anymore.....For years, Document Sets have been these powerful workhorses trapped in SharePoint's past. Offering fantastic functionality while forcing us to interact with those clunky Classic forms.It's probably the Number 1 complaint I hear when recommending Document Sets to clients. All that potential... wrapped in a UI that feels like stepping back in time (for those that remember SharePoint Classic).But there's good news.A fellow #MVP Dan has a brilliant workaround that modernises the Document Set creation experience. No more Classic forms.I've put together a step-by-step guide in the carousel below showing how you can implement this modern approach for your own Document Sets.#SharePoint …more
